chapter.title: Printing
chapter.para:
&Yap; offers two different
printing
print procedures:

section.title: Standard Windows Printing
section.para: To print the document, click Print on the File menu. This command brings up the familiar print dialog box.

section.title: &PostScript; Printing
section.para: Use the Print &PostScript; procedure if you want to print on a &PostScript; printer.

step.para: The &DVI; file is processed by &Dvips;. The result is an intermediate &PostScript; file.
The intermediate file will be send to the printer.

section.para: The printer must be capable of interpreting &PostScript;.

step.para: On the File menu, click Print PostScript.

listitem.para: Select a printer from the drop-down list.
Select the pages you want to print.
